languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (5): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Насыщение{/g} (5): союзники, ставшие целью сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +5 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

traits.locale_text: Infusing 5: Allies targeted by the Navigator powers gain a +5 bonus to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 Willpower +5 Perception

{g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (5): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

{g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (5): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Durchtränkung{/g} (5): Verbündete, die von Navigator-Kräften anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Dieser Bonus ist stapelbar und wird mit jedem Stapel bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (5): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Durchdringend{/g} 5: Verbündete, die von den Kräften des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf alle ihre Eigenschaften. Dieser Bonus wird aufaddiert und jedes Mal, wenn er aufaddiert wird, bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Imprégnation{/g} (5) : un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +5 s'applique à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des alliés ciblés par les pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Ce bonus est cumulable, et à chaque cumul il est prolongé jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur. +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (5): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Imprégnation{/g} (5) : un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +5 s'applique à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des alliés ciblés par les pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Ce bonus est cumulable, et à chaque cumul il est prolongé jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur. +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}灌注{/g}（5）：所有被导航者能力影响的盟友，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}提高5点，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (5): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}灌注{/g}（5）：所有被导航者能力影响的盟友，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}提高5点，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}

languages.original_text: Infusing 5: Allies targeted by the Navigator powers gain a +5 bonus to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 Willpower +5 Perception

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusión{/g} (5): Los aliados objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +5 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Esta bonificación se acumula y se prolonga hasta el siguiente turno del navegante cada vez que se acumula. +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}注入{/g}(5)：航宙士の力の標的となった味方は航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}+5を獲得する。このボーナスは累積し、累積するたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+5増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が+5増加
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (5): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}注入{/g}5：航宙士の力の標的となった味方は航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで全ての能力に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}+5を獲得する。このボーナスは累積し、累積するたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が5増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が5増加

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Aşılayıcı{/g} (5): Rotacı güçlerinin hedef aldığı dost birimler, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} alırlar. Bu etki, Rotacı'nın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Bu bonus üst üste birikir ve her yeni birikimde etki süresi Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek uzar. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}

This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
